title: Relaxation from Mumbai Tenancy and Agriculture Land Act : The condition that only the agriculturist will be eligible to buy the agriculture land shall not be applicable in Integrated IT Township area
clause_text: Relaxation from Mumbai Tenancy and Agriculture Land Act : The condition that only the agriculturist will be eligible to buy the agriculture land shall not be applicable in Integrated IT Township area.
